thread.title: Otto Warmbier's parents say must "shame" North Korea

title: Otto Warmbier's parents say must "shame" North Korea
text:
Otto Warmbier's parents say must "shame" North Korea Thursday, May 03, 2018 - 01:55
As Washington presses for the release of three Americans imprisoned in North Korea, the parents of a U.S. college student who died last year soon after being released from captivity in North Korea have sued Pyongyang over their son's death, saying Otto Warmbier was ''brutally tortured and murdered.'' Rough Cut (no reporter narration).
As Washington presses for the release of three Americans imprisoned in North Korea, the parents of a U.S. college student who died last year soon after being released from captivity in North Korea have sued Pyongyang over their son's death, saying Otto Warmbier was "brutally tortured and murdered." Rough Cut (no reporter narration). //reut.rs/2KyoGMB
